theAdventurer:BlueVial_TA.NAME: Blue Vial
theAdventurer:BlueVial_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Minor Blue Tonic. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:StreetFight_TA.NAME: Street Fight
theAdventurer:StreetFight_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

theAdventurer:Smash_TA.NAME: Smash
theAdventurer:Smash_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Deal !D! damage, NL gain !B! Block.

theAdventurer:TurtleShield_TA.NAME: Turtle Shield
theAdventurer:TurtleShield_TA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, !B! Block next turn, and !M! Plated Armor.

theAdventurer:TurtleEgg_TA.NAME: Turtle Egg
theAdventurer:TurtleEgg_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Hatch !M! NL Gain !B! Block and NL !B! Block next turn.

theAdventurer:Bottle_TA.NAME: Bottle
theAdventurer:Bottle_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:Slam_TA.NAME: Slam
theAdventurer:Slam_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card.

theAdventurer:Pomabomb_TA.NAME: Pomabomb
theAdventurer:Pomabomb_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, 3 times.

theAdventurer:Maul_TA.NAME: Maul
theAdventurer:Maul_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Deal !D! damage, gain !B! block. NL theadventurer:Satiated: Gain [E] [E].

theAdventurer:SnakeLash_TA.NAME: Snake Lash
theAdventurer:SnakeLash_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Cost is randomized (0-3) when drawn.

theAdventurer:KillingTime_TA.NAME: Killing Time
theAdventurer:KillingTime_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL End your turn.

theAdventurer:FallingKick_TA.NAME: Falling Kick
theAdventurer:FallingKick_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theadventurer:Satiated: Gain [E] and draw 1 card.

theAdventurer:ExplodingFist_TA.NAME: Exploding Fist
theAdventurer:ExplodingFist_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Take !M! damage.

theAdventurer:CoinToss_TA.NAME: Coin Toss
theAdventurer:CoinToss_TA.DESCRIPTION: Pay 1 gold. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

theAdventurer:Balance_TA.NAME: Balance
theAdventurer:Balance_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is fully blocked, gain !M! theadventurer:Stout.

theAdventurer:FireScroll_TA.NAME: Fire Scroll
theAdventurer:FireScroll_TA.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark. NL ALL enemies gain theadventurer:Sauté equal to their Mark. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:ChainSpell_TA.NAME: Chain Spell
theAdventurer:ChainSpell_TA.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark. NL ALL enemies gain Weak equal to their Mark.

theAdventurer:MolotovCocktail_TA.NAME: Molotov Cocktail
theAdventurer:MolotovCocktail_TA.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Bottle cards in your hand and apply !M! theadventurer:Sauté for each card discarded.

theAdventurer:FanTheFlames_TA.NAME: Fan The Flames
theAdventurer:FanTheFlames_TA.DESCRIPTION: Double all enemies theadventurer:Sauté. NL Exhaust.
theAdventurer:FanTheFlames_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple all enemies theadventurer:Sauté. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:SilverShiv_TA.NAME: Silver Shiv
theAdventurer:SilverShiv_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard the top card of your deck.

theAdventurer:Maim_TA.NAME: Maim
theAdventurer:Maim_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage damage X times. Apply X theadventurer:Gored and Weak.
theAdventurer:Maim_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage damage X+1 times. Apply X+1 theadventurer:Gored and Weak.

theAdventurer:Gore_TA.NAME: Gore
theAdventurer:Gore_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Gored.

theAdventurer:GoldenGoose_TA.NAME: Golden Goose
theAdventurer:GoldenGoose_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage. NL (1 damage for each each 5 gold you have.)

theAdventurer:StrangeChicken_TA.NAME: Strange Chicken
theAdventurer:StrangeChicken_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard all eggs and draw that many cards.

theAdventurer:Muffle_TA.NAME: Muffle
theAdventurer:Muffle_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to apply a debuff, gain !M! artifact.

theAdventurer:ClockworkBlade_TA.NAME: Clockwork Blade
theAdventurer:ClockworkBlade_TA.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage. NL (1 damage for each each floor you have climbed.)

theAdventurer:Bite_TA.NAME: Bite
theAdventurer:Bite_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Apply !M! Mark. Deal !D! to each Marked enemy.

theAdventurer:FireBird_TA.NAME: Fird Bird
theAdventurer:FireBird_TA.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theadventurer:Sauté. NL Draw a card.

theAdventurer:ClockworkEgg_TA.NAME: Clockwork Egg
theAdventurer:ClockworkEgg_TA.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards next turn. NL theadventurer:Hatch !M!.

theAdventurer:Hexapepper_TA.NAME: Hexapepper
theAdventurer:Hexapepper_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Apply !M! theadventurer:Sauté. Shuffle a *Burn into your deck.

theAdventurer:CrystalFruit_TA.NAME: Crystal Fruit
theAdventurer:CrystalFruit_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Gain 2 temporary Strength. Add a *Crystal *Shiv to your hand.
theAdventurer:CrystalFruit_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. Add a *Crystal *Shiv+ to your hand.

theAdventurer:WardingMushroom_TA.NAME: Warding Mushroom
theAdventurer:WardingMushroom_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust

theAdventurer:Egg_TA.NAME: Egg
theAdventurer:Egg_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Gain 1 energy next turn. theadventurer:Hatch !M!.

theAdventurer:Bannnango_TA.NAME: Bannnango
theAdventurer:Bannnango_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:DurganFruit_TA.NAME: Durgan Fruit
theAdventurer:DurganFruit_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:BlackBile_TA.NAME: Black Bile
theAdventurer:BlackBile_TA.DESCRIPTION: If you are theadventurer:Satiated lose theadventurer:Satiated and Exhaust.

theAdventurer:ToxicMushroom_TA.NAME: Toxic Mushroom
theAdventurer:ToxicMushroom_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Lose theadventurer:Satiated NL Draw !M! cards. Shuffle a *Black *Bile into your draw pile.

theAdventurer:DarkRitual_TA.NAME: Dark Ritual
theAdventurer:DarkRitual_TA.DESCRIPTION: If you are theadventurer:Satiated gain 1 Ritual, otherwise gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.
theAdventurer:DarkRitual_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you are theadventurer:Satiated gain 1 Ritual and Exhaust, otherwise gain 1 Strength.

theAdventurer:MagicMushroom_TA.NAME: Magic Mushroom
theAdventurer:MagicMushroom_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Put a Potion card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
theAdventurer:MagicMushroom_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Forage 1. NL Put a Potion card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

theAdventurer:GuardianEnt_TA.NAME: Guardian Ent
theAdventurer:GuardianEnt_TA.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

theAdventurer:HideInATree_TA.NAME: Hide In A Tree
theAdventurer:HideInATree_TA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If theadventurer:Satiated gain 1 Blur.

theAdventurer:CrystalShield_TA.NAME: Crystal Shield
theAdventurer:CrystalShield_TA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Shuffle a *Crystal *Shiv into your deck. NL Exhaust.
theAdventurer:CrystalShield_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Shuffle !M! *Crystal *Shivs into your deck. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:Candle_TA.NAME: Candle
theAdventurer:Candle_TA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theadventurer:Sauté. NL Gain [E] [E] and draw a card.

theAdventurer:GrimProphecy_TA.NAME: Grim Prophecy
theAdventurer:GrimProphecy_TA.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, Scry 13 and lose 1 energy.

theAdventurer:Root_TA.NAME: Root
theAdventurer:Root_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Gain !B! block, [E] [E] and Entangled.

theAdventurer:Swipe_TA.NAME: Swipe
theAdventurer:Swipe_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Polymorph. NL Steal up to !M! block from target enemy.

theAdventurer:Parasite_TA.NAME: Parasite
theAdventurer:Parasite_TA.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL theadventurer:Forage !M!.

theAdventurer:LavaWall_TA.NAME: Lava Wall
theAdventurer:LavaWall_TA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! theadventurer:Sauté to the attacker.

theAdventurer:NirvanaPotion_TA.NAME: Nirvana Potion
theAdventurer:NirvanaPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain an Entropic Brew. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:OrangePotion_TA.NAME: Orange Potion
theAdventurer:OrangePotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Blessing of the Forge. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:PurplePotion_TA.NAME: Purple Potion
theAdventurer:PurplePotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Distilled Chaos. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:RedPotion_TA.NAME: Red Potion
theAdventurer:RedPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain an Attack Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:MudPotion_TA.NAME: Muddy Potion
theAdventurer:MudPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Regrowth Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:CrystalPotion_TA.NAME: Blue Potion
theAdventurer:CrystalPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Crystal Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:DeathPotion_TA.NAME: Yellow Potion
theAdventurer:DeathPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Death Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:LavaPotion_TA.NAME: Lava Potion
theAdventurer:LavaPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Lava Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:SeerPotion_TA.NAME: Seer Potion
theAdventurer:SeerPotion_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Potion. NL Obtain a Seer Potion. NL Exhaust.

theAdventurer:MaskofFaces_TA.NAME: Mask of Faces
theAdventurer:MaskofFaces_TA.DESCRIPTION: Polymorph cards cost !M! less to play the turn they are drawn.

theAdventurer:MaskofRenewal_TA.NAME: Mask of Renewal
theAdventurer:MaskofRenewal_TA.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

theAdventurer:WoodenMask_TA.NAME: Mask of Renewal
theAdventurer:WoodenMask_TA.DESCRIPTION: theadventurer:Satiated no longer prevents you from using theadventurer:Forage.

theAdventurer:MaskofRage_TA.NAME: Mask of Rage
theAdventurer:MaskofRage_TA.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn each enemy gains !M! theadventurer:Sauté.

theAdventurer:KintsugiMask_TA.NAME: Kintsugi Mask
theAdventurer:KintsugiMask_TA.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose hp, gain !M! energy next turn.

theAdventurer:FeatherMask_TA.NAME: FeatherMask_TA
theAdventurer:FeatherMask_TA.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an egg. Reduce it's hatch value by !M!.
theAdventurer:FeatherMask_TA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Whenever you play an egg. Reduce it's hatch value by !M!.

theAdventurer:SpellBook_TA.NAME: Spell Book
theAdventurer:SpellBook_TA.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn apply !M! mark to a random enemy and then deal damage to each enemy equal to their mark.

theAdventurer:FoodFight_TA.NAME: Food Fight
theAdventurer:FoodFight_TA.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theadventurer:Satiated, gain !M! Block.

theAdventurer:Indigestion_TA.NAME: Indigestion
theAdventurer:Indigestion_TA.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a theadventurer:Forage card or use a Potion card. Each enemy gains !M! theadventurer:Sauté.

theAdventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theAdventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theAdventurer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theAdventurer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theAdventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theAdventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theAdventurer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theAdventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theAdventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theAdventurer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
